description:
The 999 lands on a planet where every inhabitant is a beggar. But there is a married couple, Rage and Pity, who want it to stop. They board the 999 because they are sick of all the beggars and want to go to another planet where they can live on their own power alone. They steal the money and clothes from Tetsuro and Maetel, but...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 17 Oku 6 Sen 5 Hyaku man Nin no Kurekure Hoshi
